definition[0]: a small seed from a fruit such as an apple or orange
example[1]: Have these oranges got pips in?
definition[1]: a high note that is part of a series of short sounds, used for example on the radio to show the time, or on a public telephone line to show that your money has almost finished
example[2]: The pips are going so Iâ€™d better say goodbye.
definition[2]: one of the stars on the shoulders of the coats of army officers that shows their rank
definition[3]: to beat someone in a race, competition etc, by only a small amount
example[3]: Jackson just pipped him for the gold.
